text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Now then, it's finally time to try entering a race!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Pay attention! Before you start the race, make sure to check your skills!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: A gift for you! This time, I will give you some special skill points!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: You'll earn skill points at various times during your training!
